Report.SearchSQL: SELECT sla.[SoftwareLicenseAllocationID] ,sl.Name ,cu.UserName ,sla.[ComplianceUserID] ,sla.[SoftwareLicenseID] FROM [dbo].[SoftwareLicenseAllocation] as sla JOIN SoftwareLicense as sl on sl.SoftwareLicenseID = sla.SoftwareLicenseID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ComplianceUser as cu on cu.ComplianceUserID = sla.ComplianceUserID WHERE sl.LicenseTypeID = 13
